name: MIS HQ0018 National ROTL Report Breakdown
description:
The report only focuses on outward ROTL movements as it was agreed that counting the inward movements would give a false picture of events.

This report is designed to be run as a national report to display the number of Releases on Temporary Licences (ROTL) which have occurred for all establishments for a date range selected at runtime. The report will be used by the PAG team and replaces a system whereby individual establishments would need to run a local report then submit to the PAG team on a monthly basis.

dataset.name: TAP Movements
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE, COUNT(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY || AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.MOVEMENT_SEQ) AS COUNT_OF_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ESCORT.ESCORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.REASON_CODE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESCORT AT_DIM_ESCORT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM WHERE (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DATE_SK) AND (CASE WHEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_TYPE = 'Establishment' THEN AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.FROM_LOCATION_SK END = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_DIM_ESCORT.ESCORT_SK (+) = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.ESCORT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for Movement Location From Code:','A','External Movements\Movement Location From Code with Security',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2) */) AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Start Date:','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter End Date:','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE = 'OUT' AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE IN ('Temporary Absence / Home Leave', 'Temporary Absence')) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE, AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_ESCORT.ESCORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.REASON_CODE), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DIRECTION_CODE, COUNT_OF_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, DAY_DATE, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, ESCORT_DESCRIPTION, REASON_CODE, CASE WHEN COUNT_OF_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE COUNT_OF_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS END AS V_COUNT_OF_TAPS FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: unknown_parameter
parameters.display: Enter value(s) for Movement Location From Code:
parameters.description: @prompt('Enter value(s) for Movement Location From Code:','A','External Movements\Movement Location From Code with Security',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2)

dataset.name: Establishments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_FROM), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_OF_TAPS
field.legacySql: =If(IsNull([Count of External Movements]);0;[Count of External Movements])
